# Hi there, I'm Nathan Bird 👋

I'm a recently-graduated Software Engineer passionate about coding fun 🍴 (see [dining-philosophers](https://github.com/nbird11/dining-philosophers)), useful 🛠️ (to me at least, see [punch-pwsh](https://github.com/nbird11/punch-pwsh)), and/or technically challenging 🧠 (see [unordered_set](https://github.com/nbird11/unordered_set-cpp-stl)) programs.

## 🚀 Active Projects

- ✍️ QuickPen, a productivity tool for writers to overcome writer's block (see [QuickPen Homepage](https://quickpen.web.app/))
- 🪑 A seating chart application inspired by draw.io for my friend who's a teacher
- 🃏 An online score sheet for the card game "Back Alley" (see [back-alley](https://github.com/nbird11/back-alley))
